title: A Small Modular Reactors strategy for a competitive, net-zero Europe [Promoted Content]
summary_full: As Europe gears up for a net-zero future, innovation in low-carbon energy sources will be key. Technologies such as Small Modular Reactors represent a major opportunity to tackle the challenge of decarbonising fast without undermining competitiveness.
